titleStmt.title: Compendium geographicum, or, A more exact, plain, and easie introduction into all geography ... after the latest discoveries, or alterations, very useful, especially for young noblemen and gentlemen, the like not printed in English / by Peregrin Clifford Chamberlayne ...
titleStmt.author: Chamberlayne, Peregrine Clifford.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with print show-through; p. 137 torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
